pull_requests.title: feat: Implement OAuth 2.1 authentication (OPSHIFT-123)
pull_requests.author: sarah-chen
pull_requests.body:
This PR implements OAuth 2.1 authentication as specified in OPSHIFT-123.

Key changes:
- Add Auth0 integration
- Implement PKCE flow
- Add refresh token rotation
- Update authentication middleware

Breaking change: OAuth 2.0 endpoints are deprecated. Migration guide in docs.

Tested with: Okta, Auth0, Azure AD

pull_requests.title: fix: Implement pagination for pod listing API (OPSHIFT-125)
pull_requests.author: david-kim
pull_requests.body:
Fixes critical timeout issue in /api/v1/pods endpoint.

Changes:
- Add pagination support (limit, offset parameters)
- Implement lazy loading for pod metadata
- Add response streaming for large result sets
- Optimize database queries

Performance:
- Before: Timeout on >1000 pods
- After: 2.3s response time for 5000 pods

Backward compatible: Old clients still work, new clients can use pagination.
